name: UIFocusAnimationCoordinator
desc: A coordinator of focus-related animations during a focus update.

items.name: func addCoordinatedFocusingAnimations(((UIFocusAnimationContext) -> Void)?, completion: (() -> Void)?)
items.desc: Runs the specified set of animations together with the system animations for adding focus to an item.

items.name: func addCoordinatedUnfocusingAnimations(((UIFocusAnimationContext) -> Void)?, completion: (() -> Void)?)
items.desc: Runs the specified set of animations together with the system animations for removing focus from an item.

items.name: func addCoordinatedAnimations((() -> Void)?, completion: (() -> Void)?)
items.desc: Specifies the animations to coordinate with the active focus animation.

items.name: protocol UIFocusAnimationContext
items.desc: Information about focusing animations being performed by the system.
